subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets lost Game 7 of the N.L.C.S. Thursday night despite one of the most remarkable grabs the postseason has ever seen by Endy Chávez.
snippet: The Mets lost Game 7 of the N.L.C.S. Thursday night despite one of the most remarkable grabs the postseason has ever seen by Endy Chávez.
